text: Super Bowl LVII was the 57th Super Bowl. It was the final game of the 2022 NFL season and the end of the 2022–23 NFL playoffs. It was played between the National Football Conference (NFC) champions Philadelphia Eagles and the American Football Conference (AFC) champions Kansas City Chiefs. The game was played on February 12, 2023, at State Farm Stadium in Glendale, Arizona. The Kansas City Chiefs beat the Philadelphia Eagles, 38–35. Rihanna performed in the Super Bowl LVII halftime show on February 12, 2023. Rihanna’s halftime show reached a total of 118.7 million viewers. ==References== Category:February 2023 events *057 Category:Sports in Glendale, Arizona Category:2023 in American sports Category:21st century in Arizona
title: Super Bowl LVII
